metadata.title: CVE-2016-4487 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in libiberty allows remote attackers to causea denial of service (segmentation fault and crash) via a crafted binary,related to "btypevec."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4487` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

valgrind - 1:3.11.0-1ubuntu4.2
No subscription required

gdb - 7.11.1-0ubuntu1~16.5
gdb-multiarch - 7.11.1-0ubuntu1~16.5
gdb-source - 7.11.1-0ubuntu1~16.5
gdb64 - 7.11.1-0ubuntu1~16.5
gdbserver - 7.11.1-0ubuntu1~16.5
No subscription required

binutils - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm1
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm1
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm1
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm1

binutils-mips-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm1
binutils-mips64-linux-gnuabi64 - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm1
binutils-mips64el-linux-gnuabi64 - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm1
binutils-mipsel-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm1
binutils-multiarch - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm1
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm1
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnuspe - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm1
binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm1
binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm1
binutils-s390x-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm1
binutils-sh4-linux-gnu - 2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm1

Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: valgrind package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.11.0-1ubuntu4.2').
ht package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
gcc-h8300-hms package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
gdb package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.11.1-0ubuntu1~16.5').
gccxml package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
binutils-h8300-hms package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
gcc-arm-none-eabi package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
nescc package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
sdcc package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
binutils package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.26.1-1ubuntu1~16.04.8+esm1').
